name: Aries
message: You are bold and passionate. Act on your instincts.

name: Taurus
message: Steady and loyal, you are the rock others rely on.

name: Gemini
message: Curious and clever — your mind never rests.

name: Cancer
message: Empathic and nurturing, your emotions guide you.

name: Leo
message: Confident and radiant, you lead from the heart.

name: Virgo
message: Precise and thoughtful — order brings you peace.

name: Libra
message: Balance and beauty shape your every decision.

name: Scorpio
message: Mysterious and intense, you feel everything deeply.

name: Sagittarius
message: Freedom and adventure fuel your spirit.

name: Capricorn
message: Disciplined and wise, you are built to endure.

name: Aquarius
message: Visionary and unique — you walk your own path.

name: Pisces
message: Dreamy and compassionate, you feel the world's rhythm.
